members.name: BlobEvent()
members.description: Creates a BlobEvent event with the given parameters.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Is an Blob associated with the event.

parameters.name: timecodeÂ Optional
parameters.description: A DOMHighResTimeStamp to be used in initializing the blob event.

members.name: BlobEvent.data
members.description: A Blob representing the data associated with the event. The event was fired on the EventTarget because of something happening on that specific Blob.

members.name: BlobEvent.timecode
members.description: A DOMHighResTimeStamp indicating the difference between the timestamp of the first chunk in data and the timestamp of the first chunk in the first BlobEvent produced by this recorder. Note that the timecode in the first produced BlobEvent does not need to be zero.
